testsuite.name: Scenario: Verify that the unchecked Show Launch Page policy gets checked when Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the unchecked Show Launch Page policy gets checked when Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the unchecked Show Launch Page policy gets checked when Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: And I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the unchecked Show Launch Page policy gets checked when Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: And Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the unchecked Show Launch Page policy gets checked when Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: When I click on the set policies tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the unchecked Show Launch Page policy gets checked when Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: And I set the show launch page checkbox to false
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the unchecked Show Launch Page policy gets checked when Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: And I set the proctor sign-in checkbox to true
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the unchecked Show Launch Page policy gets checked when Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: Then I see an alert message stating that the launch page will be enabled
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the unchecked Show Launch Page policy gets checked when Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: And I see that the show launch page checkbox is set to true
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the unchecked Show Launch Page policy gets checked when Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the unchecked Show Launch Page policy gets checked when Proctor Authorization is required

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the assignment has advanced policies ?[90m# assignment/AssignmentPolicies.feature:48?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click on the set policies tab?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.clickSetPoliciesTab()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click the Advanced Policies button?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.clickAdvancedPoliciesButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the Advanced Policies Editor page?[0m ?[90m# AdvancedPoliciesEditorSteps.assertOnAdvancedPoliciesPage()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click the Design button?[0m ?[90m# AdvancedPoliciesEditorSteps.clickDesignButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see the Remove Criterion button?[0m ?[90m# AdvancedPoliciesEditorSteps.assertRemoveCriterionButtonIsVisible()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click the Back button?[0m ?[90m# AdvancedPoliciesEditorSteps.clickBackButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the Policy Editor?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.assertOnPolicyEditor()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI see that the show launch page checkbox is set to ?[0m?[32m?[1mtrue?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.assertShowLaunchPageState(boolean)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI see that the show launch page checkbox is disabled?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.assertShowLaunchPageDisabled()?[0m
